output:
One, two, three, four.
Hey, Scratch!
Keep rolling along for you and the Ratch!
For yellow cash!
One pound!
Knock-knock's right here!
Knock-knock!
To get a snack!
Knock-knock!
You're banging on my door all night!
To get a crash!
Get going!
Right out of my space!
It's time to move it on!
Get down!
Long door!
By Scratch!
Take that!
Long door!
By Scratch!
Take that!
Long door!
You're trash!
That's it!
Good God!
I spit!
Come on now, Sour Babe!
Might get our chance!
Let's kick this thing over!
Skid jump, half-pense!
There's one thing I know for sure, and
it's bugging me!
Just keep on scratching,
now you scratch my domain!
Hey, Scratch!
Keep rolling along for you and the Ratch!
For yellow cash!
One pound!
Knock-knock's right here!
Knock-knock!
To get a snack!
Knock-knock!
You're banging on my door all night!
To get a crash!
Get going!
Right out of my space!
It's time to move it on!
Get down!
Long door!
By Scratch!
Take that!
Long door!
Missed match!
Yeah, that!
Long door!
You're trash!
That's it!
Good God!
I spit!
New house all night long!
I see no way out!
I'm through with this backyard!
That there's no doubt!
When I start running,
you chase after me!
No, I'm heading faster, babe!
Now I'm breaking free!
Stopped in the corner, he's forgot his phone!
Can't stop me, I'm going to get him!
Stopped in the corner, he's forgot his phone!
Can't see the doghouse, sitting all alone!
Hey, Scratch!
Where do you go?
Hey, Scratch!
Nobody knows!
Stopped in the corner, he's forgot his phone!
Can't see the doghouse, sitting all alone!
Hey, Scratch!
Where do you go?
Hey, Scratch!
Nobody knows!
Yeah!
Yeah!
Long door!
By Scratch!
Take that!
Long door!
Missed match!
Get back!
Long door!
You're trash!
That's it!
Good God!
